name: gemini-code-review
title: Gemini Code Review
description: An AI boosted assistant that helps you review your code locally before asking for real "human" code review
author: dorian_frances

commands.name: review-my-code
commands.title: Review My Code
commands.subtitle: Ask for advice on the current changes of my code

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
